name: 金杰·克雷斯曼
name_full: 金杰·克雷斯曼 Ginger Cressman
introduction: Ginger Cressman was born in Charlotte, TN to Henry and Kathy Robinson. As a teenager, she had an interest in acting and modeling that proved to be a fruitful endeavor. She signed to a modeling agency as a teenager and gained experience in runway, print, commercials and music videos.She went to Austin Peay State University where she received a bachelors degree in teaching and continued to work on her talents. She went on to teach a few years and use her talents in the classroom.Recently Ginger has been cast in lead roles as well as supporting roles in feature films, short films, episodics and commercials. She also continues to model for editorial, print, web and commercial advertisements.
